pl.dfa.learner.automaton.pso

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.dfa.learner.automaton.pso.Particle

  • public class Particle
extends Object
    Representation of a particle in the particle swarm optimisation metaheuristic. Each particle keeps track of it's current position (solution), best position (solution) and the current velocity.
    See Also:
    https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Particle_swarm_optimization

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Particle(Solution solution)
      New particle based on an initial solution.
      Particle(Solution solution, double maxTransitionSpeed, double maxAcceptedSpeed)
      Creates a new particle with defined speed boundaries

      Evaluates current and best solutions found by this particle
      Solution getParticleBest()
      Gets the best position (solution) that this particle ever was.

      Gets the current solution for this particle

      Gets the number of states

                double maxTransitionSpeed,
                double maxAcceptedSpeed)
        Creates a new particle with defined speed boundaries
        Parameters:
        solution - initial solution
        maxTransitionSpeed - maximum speed for transition changes
        maxAcceptedSpeed - maximum speed of acceptable states changes

        public void updateVelocity(PSOParams params,
                           Solution bestSoFar)
        Updates the velocity for this solution as defined in the PSO metaheuristic.
        Parameters:
        params - velocity change parameters
        bestSoFar - best solution found so far by the entire swarm
